pageTitle: Nikon | News | Nikon Introduces Sporty and Compact ACULON A30 Binoculars
textBeforeTable: Specifications Available in two body colours: black and silver Eco-glass optics that are free of lead and arsenic are used for all lenses and prisms Fold-up design; easy to carry around Firm, comfortable, rubber-coated grip Long eye relief design (8x25 model) Multilayer-coated lenses for brighter images Compact and lightweight Key Features ACULON A30 10x25 (silver) ACULON A30 8x25 (black) The name ACULON was created by combining the terms "accuracy" and "precision" to form a familiar-sounding word that represents Nikon's desire for more people to rediscover the beautiful details of everyday life through binoculars. ACULON A30 binoculars are easy-to-use, general-purpose binoculars ideal for a wide range of situations — from sporting events to travel. Incorporating Nikon’s quality optics into a svelte, compact and lightweight body design, these binoculars can be compactly folded thanks to their biaxial design. The grip is coated with rubber material that makes it firm and comfortable to hold, and these binoculars are small enough to take anywhere you want to go. Nikon Vision Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Nikon Corporation, is pleased to announce the release of our sporty, compact ACULON A30 binoculars. March 28, 2013 Nikon Introduces
